Recycling.Description: Recycling plastic reduces the amount of waste that goes to landfills and helps conserve resources.
Recycling paper saves energy compared to producing new paper from virgin materials.
Recycling glass reduces the need for new glass production, which requires significant energy and emits greenhouse gases.
Recycling metal helps preserve natural resources and reduces the environmental impact of mining and extraction.
